General.Name: Ndr Auto Components Limited
General.Description: NDR Auto Components Limited engages in manufacturing, fabricating, assembling, selling, and trading of automotive components for passenger cars and utility vehicles primarily in India. It provides seat frames and seat trims for two-wheeler and four-wheeler vehicles, as well as body in white parts; and spare parts and components for seats. The company was incorporated in 2019 and is headquartered in Gurugram, India.
General.Address: Maruti Joint Venture Complex, Gurugram, India, 122015

1.Name: Mr. Rajat  Bhandari
